SourceString: <i>Much have I suffered, labored long and hard by now in the waves and wars. Add this to the total - bring the trial on! </>
This is a description of available rituals
<i>Invoking Athena, the goddess of skill and strategy, allows exploration of alternate tactics from those already committed to.</>
<i>Invoking Ares, the god of battle and glory, allows for even greater martial challenges, as well as the chance to face old foes.</>
Choose how many levels you want to increase or decrease enemy levels by.\r\nThe cost of the ritual scales based on the difference in levels.
• Elevate enemy levels in previous areas
Elevate the minimum level of enemies to your current level.\r\nThe cost of the ritual scales based on the increase.
Are you sure you want to activate this ritual?
Rituals are not available in multiplayer sessions yet.
Ritual is not available in multiplayer.
